verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump attorney Rudy Giuliani] [V: dismissed] [ARG1: President Donald Trump 's misstatements and untruths] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] , but he admitted that lying breaks one of the Bible 's Ten Commandments .
Trump attorney Rudy Giuliani dismissed President Donald Trump 's misstatements and untruths on Sunday , but [ARG0: he] [V: admitted] [ARG1: that lying breaks one of the Bible 's Ten Commandments] .
Trump attorney Rudy Giuliani dismissed President Donald Trump 's misstatements and untruths on Sunday , but he admitted that [V: lying] breaks one of the Bible 's Ten Commandments .
